p:
After excluding individuals receiving anti-hypertensive treatment, the eligible sample size was 7017 (FHS, n = 3679; EGCUT, n = 972; RS, n = 604; InCHIANTI, n = 597; KORA F4, n = 565 and SHIP-TREND, n = 600). Clinical characteristics of participants from the four studies are presented in
Table 1 . The mean age varied across the cohorts (FHS = 51, EGCUT = 36, RS = 58, InCHIANTI = 71, KORA F4 = 72 and SHIP-TREND = 46 years) as did the proportion of individuals with hypertension (11% in FHS, 19% in EGCUT, 35% in RS, 45% in InCHIANTI, 26% in KORA, and 12% in SHIP).
